room.title: PeEll's Yard
room.description: You enter a grand yard reaching out into the distance in every direction. To the west is the entrance to PeEll's House, to the north is a grand forest.

room.title: Inside the House
room.description: Inside this clean, well organized house, there is elegant leather furniture. Against the east wall there is a stone fireplace. To the north one can see the kitchen, to the west is a storage room, and upstairs are the bedrooms.

room.title: Storage Room
room.description: The storage room of the house. The remnant dust of magic lies in the corners of the room, indicating that perhaps this room is not only used for the storage of PeEll's items, but also as a testing room for the magical creation of new items. The door to the east leads back into the rest of the house. Neat shelves hold numerous standard items including numerous weapons, pieces of armor, and even items worth large amounts of gold.

room.title: The Kitchen
room.description: PeEll's kitchen does not have many of the modern conveniences, or the latest tools of the cooking trade, but it does have a large table to prepare meals on, and a huge stove against the north wall, allowing people to cook any of their favorite dishes. The stove has a moveable stone floor, allowing you to cook using coal, wood, or any other material that generates heat.

room.title: Hallway
room.description: Change the title of this room by typing "rtitle <new title>". Enter the description of this room by typing "rdescription <description>".

room.title: PeEll's House
room.description: A sturdy wooden cabin sits on the top of a small hill. A tingle of magic and power surrounds the entire house.

room.title: East of the Village
room.description: A worn pathway guides the way towards the village.

room.title: East of the Village
room.description: To the west you see a small village that appears to be filled with trolls, this village seems poorly organized, but fairly safe and sunny. To the south is a stone path leading to a large castle with flags with an emblem of a book.

room.title: The Great Road
room.description: The path begins to become more and more sparse as it leads out into the wilderness to the east. Here the great road is simply a well-worn path in the earth.

room.title: The Great Road
room.description: The path begins to become more and more sparse as it leads out into the wilderness to the east. Here the great road is simply a well-worn path in the earth.

room.title: The Great Road
room.description: The path begins to become more and more sparse as it leads out into the wilderness to the east. Here the great road is simply a well-worn path in the earth.

room.title: The Great Road
room.description: The path begins to become more and more sparse as it leads out into the wilderness to the east. There is a forest a little distance from both sides of the road. The trees are short and do not have many leaves. Because of this there is plenty of light during the daytime.

room.title: The Great Road
room.description: The path begins to become more and more sparse as it leads out into the wilderness to the east. There is a forest a little distance from both sides of the road. The trees are short and do not have many leaves. Because of this there is plenty of light during the daytime.

room.title: The Great Road
room.description: The path begins to become more and more sparse as it leads out into the wilderness to the east. There is a forest a little distance from both sides of the road. The trees are short and do not have many leaves. Because of this there is plenty of light during the daytime.

room.title: The Great Road
room.description: The path begins to become more and more sparse as it leads out into the wilderness to the east. There is a forest a little distance from both sides of the road. The trees are short and do not have many leaves. Because of this there is plenty of light during the daytime.

room.title: The Great Road
room.description: The path begins to become more and more sparse as it leads out into the wilderness to the east. The forest is a little thicker here than the rest of the great road, but visibility is still high and there is little chance of an ambush.

room.title: The Great Road
room.description: The path begins to become more and more sparse as it leads out into the wilderness to the east. The forest is a little thicker here than the rest of the great road, but visibility is still high and there is little chance of an ambush.

room.title: The Great Road
room.description: The path begins to become more and more sparse as it leads out into the wilderness to the east. The forest is a little thicker here than the rest of the great road, but visibility is still high and there is little chance of an ambush.

room.title: The Great Road
room.description: The path begins to become more and more sparse as it leads out into the wilderness to the east. The forest is a little thicker here than the rest of the great road, but visibility is still high and there is little chance of an ambush.

room.title: The Great Road
room.description: The path begins to become more and more sparse as it leads out into the wilderness to the east. The great road is little more than a worn path through the trees at this point, until the lands to the east are developed more and become more popular destinations.

room.title: The Great Road
room.description: The path begins to become more and more sparse as it leads out into the wilderness to the east. The great road is little more than a worn path through the trees at this point, until the lands to the east are developed more and become more popular destinations.

room.description: The great road seems to end here.
